name: Yogi Bear: Cartoon Capers
overview: In this vast multi-level platform game, Yogi is awoken from his winter sleep to discover that work has started on a chemical plant in the heart of Jellystone Park. Yogi's mission to alert Ranger Smith of the danger turns into a true fast-paced hilarious adventure through five different terrains of Jellystone Park! ● Over 20 exciting and taxing levels ● Racoons, Gophers, Percupines, leaping Salmon and Skunks all spell trouble for Yogi ● Each level contains over 200 screens of action ● More than 300 frames of animation
